alert.note: Alert for Green (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:50AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREEN AND SOUTHWESTERN ROCK COUNTIES... At 750 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brodhead, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Janesville, Beloit, Monroe, Brodhead, Orfordville, Footville, Newark, Hanover, Afton, Juda, and Avon. People attending Rock County 4-H Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
